name: Domestic sales and domestic R&D performed by the company as a percentage of domestic sales, by selected industry and employment size, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2021
description: Domestic sales and domestic R&D performed by the company as a percentage of domestic sales, by selected industry and employment size, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_companies_total_sales
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of U.S. dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_all_companies_r_d_as_percentage_of_sales
variableMeasured.description: All Companies R D As Percentage Of Sales
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of U.S. dollars and percent

variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of U.S. dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_5_9_employees_total_sales
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of U.S. dollars and percent

variableMeasured.name: field_5_9_employees_r_d_as_percentage_of_sales

variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of U.S. dollars and percent

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding or unavailable NAICS detail for select records beyond the 4-digit industry classification. Industry classification is based on dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2022 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2021.
